text:
3.
WISCONSIN PLAGE NAMES
Harold A. Engel, WHA, has compiled a pronouncing Gazetteer of place-
names for announcers. The pronunciations in the hooklet are based on
local preferences and usage. Says Engel, ‘’Nothing destroys a listen¬
er’s confidence in an announcer or a speaker more quickly than mis¬
pronunciations. “
SEND 30 COPIES FOR THE PACKET
Don’t forget the packet will be forwarded the first of each month with
the News Letter of that date. Many a good idea has been exchanged in
this NAEB packet. Too, your executive secretary is Frank E. Schooley,
University of Illinois, Urbana, Illinois. Some of the NAEB members
are still mailing packet material to Madison, Wisconsin.
I
